download.faq1.question: 1.WHAT SHOULD I DO IF THE SOFTWARE CANNOT BE TURNED ON OR FLASH BACK AFTER INSTALLING AND INSTALLING?
download.faq1.answer: You just need to uninstall the installed apps first, Re-install on the download page. After the application download and install, Trust the APP software in Settings-General-VPN & Devices Management, you can use it normally
download.faq2.question: 2.WHAT IS A LONG-TERM SIGNATURE PACKAGE?
download.faq2.answer: What is a long-term signature package? The iOS long-term signature package is a way to sign with an enterprise certificate, which will not be unusable due to the expiration of the certificate, and can effectively reduce the number of frequently authorized software signatures. The service is provided by a third party, and repeated installations within the validity period are free of charge.

aaPoker.title: AA POKER
aaPoker.subtitle: YOUR FIRST CHOICE OF HOME GAME
aaPoker.gameplay.title: THE MOST COMPREHENSIVE GAMEPLAY, "I HAVE THE MOST AND THE BEST."
aaPoker.gameplay.desc: Our online gaming platform has the richest customizable configuration and the best experience, meeting diverse player needs with Texas Hold'em, Omaha, Squid Game Mode, and more.
aaPoker.visualImpact.title: A VARIETY OF DESKTOPS, VISUAL IMPACT.
aaPoker.visualImpact.desc: At AA POKER, we focus on the player experience, so we have a wide variety of table styles to freely switch between. We offer classic AA POKER tabletops, minimalist dark grey tabletops, stage theater tabletops, treasure hunting tabletops, mysterious space tabletops, cinema scene tabletops, ice and snow tabletops, sunny beach tabletops, and underwater world tabletops.
aaPoker.experience.title: A DIVERSE POKER EXPERIENCE.
aaPoker.experience.desc: TLPT originated in Sydney, Australia and is a global elite event aimed at promoting the globalization of international competitive poker. TLPT has a large player base worldwide, with nearly 15 world champions including Joe Hacham, Dan Cates, Zhou Quan, Chen Dong. All competitions follow the principles of professionalism, fairness, and transparency.
aaPoker.protection.title: MULTI-DIMENSIONAL PROTECTION，A WORLD WITHOUT THIEVES
aaPoker.protection.desc: By detecting GPS and IP information to restrict cheating, and through a professional anti cheating team, monitoring game dynamics around the clock, we continuously combat cheating behavior and safeguard a fair gaming environment!
about.title: ANYONE COULD BE A STAR!
about.subtitle: DOWNLOAD THE APP, ENTER THE CARD WITHIN 5 SECONDS
about.aboutP1: In AA POKER, we strive to provide a safe and fair game platform for all poker enthusiasts.
about.aboutP2: Using AA POKER, you can play poker with friends anytime, anywhere, to create your own club or create a fast card, select your favorite poker game from our popular options.
about.aboutP3: We hope you can enjoy your favorite poker in AA POKER!!
champions.title: CHAMPIONS
champions.subtitle: OUR WORLD-CLASS PLAYERS
champions.heroTitle: THE PEAK SHOWDOWN VENUE • THE BIRTHPLACE OF LEGENDS
champions.heroDesc: AA Friends Circle brings the world's top poker masters and new forces together. They inject competitive charm into each game, making it more passionate and energetic. Go to AA POKER and log on now. Between wins and losses, legends are being born.
modal.gameplay.description: So far, it has the richest and best customized configuration among all online game platforms, meeting the different needs of various groups: Texas Hold'em, Texas Short Cards, Texas 3-1, Omaha, Squid Game Mode, Video Table, Mushroom Mode, Critical Strike Bottom Pool Jackpot, Insurance mode.
modal.gameplay.classicTexasDesc: Use your two trump cards and five common cards to make the best five cards.
modal.gameplay.shortCardDesc: Remove 2-5 and use 6-A with a total of 36 cards in the Texas gameplay.
modal.gameplay.texas31Desc: Play three cards, choose one to discard, and use the remaining two cards.
modal.gameplay.videoTableDesc: Play cards face-to-face with your friends in real-time!
modal.gameplay.mushroomDesc: Each hand's banker places a bet on the mushroom pool for big wins!
modal.gameplay.squidGameDesc: Survival competition mode based on the evolution of Texas Hold'em rules.
modal.gameplay.omahaDesc: An intellectual battlefield where absolute card strength speaks for itself.
modal.visualImpact.description: At AA POKER, we focus on the player experience, so we have a wide variety of table styles to freely switch between.
modal.visualImpact.classicTableDesc: The signature green felt table that defines the AA POKER experience.
modal.visualImpact.darkGreyDesc: A sleek, modern design for a sophisticated aesthetic.
modal.visualImpact.theaterDesc: Feel like a star under the spotlight with this dramatic design.
modal.visualImpact.treasureDesc: Adventure-themed table with maps and gold accents.
modal.visualImpact.spaceDesc: Play among the stars with galaxies and nebulas.
modal.visualImpact.underwaterDesc: Dive deep into the ocean with marine life and coral reefs.
modal.experience.description: TLPT originated in Sydney, Australia and is a global elite event aimed at promoting the globalization of international competitive poker.
modal.experience.globalEventsDesc: World-class poker tournaments that attract the best players.
modal.experience.worldChampionsDesc: Play alongside nearly 15 world champions including Joe Hacham, Dan Cates.
modal.experience.professionalismDesc: All competitions follow strict professional standards.
modal.experience.fairnessDesc: Every player has an equal opportunity to succeed.
modal.experience.transparencyDesc: Complete transparency in all our operations.
modal.protection.description: By detecting GPS and IP information to restrict cheating, and through a professional anti cheating team, monitoring game dynamics around the clock.
modal.protection.gliCertDesc: Renewed through GLI certification testing with fair random card issuance.
modal.protection.gpsIpDesc: Customized GPS and IP restrictions to minimize cheating.
modal.protection.antiCheatDesc: Dedicated team monitoring game cheating behavior 24/7.
modal.protection.simulatorsDesc: Prevent the use of simulators and emulators.
modal.protection.aiDesc: Strictly prohibit AI-powered tools or bots.
